sense.gloss: right?, isn't it?, doesn't it?, don't you?, don't you think?
hey, say, listen, look, come on
you know, you see, I must say, I should think
so, ..., well, ..., you see, ..., you understand?
I'm not sure if ..., I have my doubts about whether ...

sdata.j: ↑哀↑↓あわ↓れみと↑愛情↑↓あいじょう↓は↑紙一重↑↓|かみひとえ|↓。
↑天才↑↓てんさい↓と↑狂気↑↓きょうき↓は↑紙一重↑↓|かみひとえ|↓。
sdata.e: Genius and madness are but a hairbreadth away from each other.

sdata.j: ↑天才↑↓てんさい↓と↑狂人↑↓きょうじん↓の↑差↑↓さ↓は↑紙一重↑↓|かみひとえ|↓。
sdata.e: Genius is only one remove from insanity.

sdata.j: ↑天才↑↓てんさい↓と↑狂人↑↓きょうじん↓の↑差↑↓さ↓は↑紙一重↑↓|かみひとえ|↓だ。
sdata.e: Genius is but one remove from madness.
